## 



```{r}
# Enter function
fx <- function(x) {
  return(x^2)
}
```



```{r}
simp <- function(f, a, b) {
  if (is.function(f) == FALSE) {
    stop('f of (x) must be a function with one parameter (variable)')
  }
  
  h <- (b - a) / 2
  x0 <- a
  x1 <- a + h
  x2 <- b
  
  s <- (h / 3) * (f(x0) + 4 * f(x1) + f(x2))
  
  return(s)
}
```



```{r}
simp(fx, 0, pi/1.91184)
```
